title: RHOC PREMIERE + Single All The Way & A Cher Holiday Detour!
itunes:title: RHOC PREMIERE + Single All The Way & A Cher Holiday Detour!
itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps this week's The Real Housewives of Orange County premiere, which featured the return of Heather "Champs" Dubrow, plus Hip and Casita teaming up with Shannon Storms, and 3(!) new cast members. Danny also detours with a Cher h...
description:
Danny recaps this week's The Real Housewives of Orange County premiere, which featured the return of Heather "Champs" Dubrow, plus Hip and Casita teaming up with Shannon Storms, and 3(!) new cast members. Danny also detours with a Cher holiday tale, and ends the episode with an exclusive interview with Michael Urie and Philomen Chambers, stars of the new Netflix holiday romcom, Single All The Way, out now!


RHOC Recap: 17ish

Single All The Way: 58:50ish


PREORDER DANNY'S NEW BOOK HERE: http://smarturl.it/unremember


EVERYTHING ICONIC CYBER WEEK SALE: www.everythingiconic.store
